p: Five severe COVID‚Äê19 patients on mechanical ventilation were treated with plasma from convalescent patients. After transfusion, fever and viral load decreased, oxygenation ameliorated, three patients could be discharged, and two are in stable condition. Definitive conclusions cannot be drawn from this small study due to the lack of controls and concomitant treatment with antivirals (Shen et al ., 2020a).
